document.full_text: two time oscar nominee woody harrelson has been cast as steve schmidt, john mccain's senior campaign strategist and advisor in hbo's upcoming political film, "game change."
document.title: harrelson latest to sign on for hbo's "game change"
lines_and_colors: two time oscar nominee woody harrelson has been cast as steve schmidt, john mccain's senior campaign strategist and advisor in hbo's upcoming political film, "game change."
